SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game extends Observable
This Class represents the whole Game. It manages the players and their turns.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes the game by setting up the initial state. This method is called during construction of a Game object.

    • setGameBoard

      public void setGameBoard(int numPlayers)
      Sets the Board for the game
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - number of players, used to create the board accordingly

    • isGameReadyToStart

      public boolean isGameReadyToStart()
      Checks if game is ready to start
      Returns:
      true if the number of players currently in game is equal to the number of players specified for the game

    • getGamePhase

      public GamePhase getGamePhase()
      Returns:
      the GamePhase in which the game is

    • setGamePhase

      public void setGamePhase(GamePhase phase)
      Set the Phase of the current game
      Parameters:
      phase - the phase to set

    • nextGamePhase

      public void nextGamePhase()
      Switch GamePhase to the next one

    • randomPersonalGoal

      public PersonalGoalCard randomPersonalGoal()
      Extract a random personal goal card
      Returns:
      random personalgoal

    • startGame

      public void startGame(ArrayList<Player> playerQueue)
      Starts the Game by executing these steps: - initializes the GameBoard - Fills the board with ItemTiles - Randomly selects the two commongoals - assigns a personal goal to each player

    • handleDrawPhase

      public void handleDrawPhase()
      Prepares the info used by current player to draw items from the board

    • drawFromBoard

      public void drawFromBoard(ArrayList<Square> squares)
      Calls all the methods used to remove the selected squares from the board (and puts them in the player's hand)
      Parameters:
      squares - containing the items to remove from the board

    • getDrawnTiles

      public ArrayList<ItemTile> getDrawnTiles()
      Returns the current board.
      Returns:
      the board of the game.

    • getPlayerByUsername

      public Player getPlayerByUsername(String username)
      Returns a player given his username. Only the first occurrence is returned because the player username is considered to be unique. If no player is found null is returned.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player to be found.
      Returns:
      Returns the player given his username, null otherwise.

      the number of players chosen for the game

      Set the current player
      Parameters:

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns:

      public ArrayList<String> getPlayersUsernames()
      Returns a list of player usernames that are already in-game.
      Returns:
      a list with all usernames in the Game

      Prepares the game for the insert phase by sending the currentplayer all the info he needs to insert his tiles

      public void insertTiles(ArrayList<ItemTile> items, int column)
      Inserts the tiles in the bookshelf
      Parameters:
      items - to insert
      column - where to insert them

    • handleCalculatePhase

      public void handleCalculatePhase()
      Handles calculate phase by checking if the player has achieved any common goal

    • prepareForRefillPhase

      public void prepareForRefillPhase()
      Prepares the game for the refill phase by setting the turnphase to refill

    • handleRefillPhase

      public void handleRefillPhase()
      Handles the refill phase by placing ItemTiles randomly extracted from the Bag (only if the board needs to be refilled)

    • endGame

      public void endGame(Player winner, ArrayList<String> playersQueue)
      Ends the game and notifies the observers with the winner and leaderboard information.
      Parameters:
      winner - The player who won the game.
      playersQueue - The list of players in the game.

    • assignAdjacentItemsPoints

      public void assignAdjacentItemsPoints()
      Adds adjacent items extra points to each player

    • assignPersonalGoalPoints

      public void assignPersonalGoalPoints()
      Add personal goal points for each player

    • addPointsToPlayer

      public void addPointsToPlayer(Player p, int points)
      Adds points to a player and updates the leaderboard accordingly.
      Parameters:
      p - The player to whom points are being added.
      points - The number of points to add.

    • updateLeaderBoard

      public void updateLeaderBoard(ArrayList<String> usernamesQueue)
      Updates the leaderboard.
      Parameters:
      usernamesQueue - The list of usernames representing the order of players in the game.

    • sortLeaderBoard

      public void sortLeaderBoard(ArrayList<String> usernamesQueue)
      Sorts the leaderboard based on the players' scores in descending order and their positions in the usernames queue.
      Parameters:
      usernamesQueue - The list of usernames representing the order of players in the game.

    • isLastTurn

      public boolean isLastTurn()
      Checks if it is the last turn of the game.
      Returns:
      True if it is the last turn, false otherwise.

    • setLastTurn

      public void setLastTurn(boolean b)
      Sets the last turn status and notifies the observers.
      Parameters:
      b - The new last turn status to set.

    • addObserver

      public void addObserver(Observer o)
      Adds an observer to the list of observers for this object.
      Overrides:
      addObserver in class Observable
      Parameters:
      o - The observer to be added.

    • getLeaderboard

      public LinkedHashMap<String,Integer> getLeaderboard()
      Gets the leaderboard containing the scores of all players.
      Returns:
      The leaderboard as a LinkedHashMap, where the keys are usernames and the values are scores.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(Player player)
      Removes a player from the game.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to be removed.

    • playerRejoined

      public void playerRejoined(Player player)
      Notifies the observers that a player has rejoined the game.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who has rejoined the game.

    • isGameStarted

      public boolean isGameStarted()
      Checks if the game has started.
      Returns:
      True if the game has started, false otherwise.

    • getPersonalGoalOfPlayer

      public PersonalGoalCard getPersonalGoalOfPlayer(String username)
      Retrieves the personal goal card of the player by username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player.
      Returns:
      The personal goal card associated with the player, or null if the player does not have a personal goal card.

    • resetPlayers

      public void resetPlayers()
      Resets the list of players in the game. This method clears the existing list of players and creates a new empty list.
